org.jaffre.server

Interface JaffreServer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultJaffreServer

    public interface JaffreServer
    Author:
    Alexander Veit

    • Method Detail

      • registerInterface

        void registerInterface(Object p_obj)
        Register an endpoint interface.

        An implementation normally would choose a suitable interface implemented by the endpoint and then call registerInterface(Class, Object) with the choosen interface and the given endpoint as arguments.

        Parameters:
        p_obj - A service endpoint that implements an interface.
        See Also:
        registerInterface(Class, Object).

      • registerInterface

        void registerInterface(Class<?> p_interface,
                     Object p_obj)
        Register an endpoint interface.
        Parameters:
        p_interface - The endpoint interface.
        p_obj - A service endpoint that implements p_interface.

      • process

        JaffreReturnFrame process(JaffreCallFrame p_call,
                        Object p_extParam)
        Process a call frame.
        Parameters:
        p_call - The call frame to be processed.
        p_extParam - A parameter reserved for implementors that need to pass additional information to this method.
        Returns:
        A return frame that contains the result of the method call.

      • getEndpointInterface

        <T> T getEndpointInterface(Class<T> p_interface)
                       throws JaffreNoInterfaceException
        Support for local transport.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of interface requested from this service.
        Parameters:
        p_interface - The interface class.
        Returns:
        The requested service endpoint interface.
        Throws:
        JaffreNoInterfaceException - If p_interface is not a registered service endpoint interface.
